text: “That’s why we may end up with herd immunity,” a Mississippi doctor says. “Only the strong — or the people who take it seriously — will survive and many, many others will perish. I hate to say it, but we’re almost at natural selection at this point.” https://t.co/T5I2UyOfTT

name: NBCNews
text:
Saturday was the first time the number of new coronavirus cases recorded globally topped a quarter-million, with 259,848 new cases recorded, the World Health Organization says. 

The previous record — set 24 hours earlier — was 237,743 cases. https://t.co/NjIno2H2Ft
